question: 容赦なく
sourceMnemonic: Remember how <ja>容赦</ja> can mean "forgiveness" and "mercy?" Well add <ja>なく</ja> (basically making it NOT that), and it becomes <vocabulary>relentlessly</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>mercilessly</vocabulary>. The exact opposite of what it was before!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji (with <ja>なく</ja> attached to it). You should be able to read this on your own.
